attributes.action: Sort the pot holes out in the roads of Fleetwood, they are ruining our cars
attributes.additional_details: The money should be invested in our roads as they are sinking more and more and before we know it, we will have no roads left unless they deal with them the correct way. Don't just keep doing little jobs on them, do them properly!!
attributes.background: Can you provide funding for the roads in Fleetwood, they are getting worse and damaging our cars that we want to keep on the roads!!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road maintenance are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding to councils for pothole repairs and implement repair targets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657142
